frontmatter.description: This lesson covers testing React components, using Jest and React Testing Library to run tests, and how to make assertions on mounted React elements. We'll go into the difference between React Components and Elements, understand the purpose of the React Testing Library, and mount React elements in order to make assertions about them.
frontmatter.title: Component Testing with React Testing Library
